Titles.jpn: 闘神機ジーズフレーム

Summaries.eng: Takes place at the end of the 21st century. The human race has endowed itself with a new source of energy, Divine Grace energy, and has embarked on space exploration with particularly remarkable economic development. As they extended their exploration to Pluto, an unidentified life form called Nergal suddenly attacked and destroyed the human colony. In order to combat this new threat, the United Ground Forces decide to use the "G's Frame", an ancient robotic weapon unearthed from ruins around the world and controlled by a group of young girls nicknamed "Ancient Girls" ...
Summaries.jpn: 21世紀の終わりに行われます。 人類は新しいエネルギー源であるディバイングレイスエネルギーを授けられ、特に目覚ましい経済発展を遂げて宇宙探査に乗り出しました。 彼らが冥王星に探検を広げたとき、ネルガルと呼ばれる正体不明の生命体が突然人間のコロニーを攻撃して破壊しました。 この新たな脅威に対抗するために、ユナイテッドグラウンドフォースは、世界中の廃墟から発掘され、「古代の女の子」と呼ばれる若い女の子のグループによって制御される古代のロボット兵器である「G'sFrame」を使用することにしました...

Summaries.eng: The Earth Alliance fleet will do its utmost to challenge the space life form Nergal, which destroys everything related to the wisdom and Divine Grace system of humankind. As humanity continues to lose, the last hope was a girl with a variant who could manipulate the ancient robot weapon "G's Frame" excavated from archaeological sites around the world. The main character, Reika Minamimiya, goes to the pilot selection test of the AG unit without telling her parents, along with her friend Misaki, in order to find her sister, Rei Ame, who belongs to the 1st AG unit that went missing in the battle with Nergal. On the way home from the exam, the girls attacked by Nergal--!

Reika was miraculously selected as a pilot by Shennon's awakening, and finally the training for conformity with the G's frame started. However, after the night of Seven Stone City, Shennon did not start at all and Reika could not even board. Misaki and Arhena, who passed the strict aptitude test with dreams and hopes, are also confused by the hard physical training. Meanwhile, Unit 7 Pabilsaĝ, which was newly excavated from the Madain Sareha archaeological site in Saudi Arabia, arrives at the AG base. The girls' wish is "I also want to have a favorite machine." Synchro rate measurement with Pabilsaĝ has begun.

Reika and his friends return to the base after the battle with Nergal. Around the same time, the Earth Alliance was catching the radio waves of Asena, the favorite machine of Reika's older sister (Rei Ame), who was missing. The 2nd AG unit will head to space to find its source. However, when he suddenly learned that a myriad of Nergal groups had appeared over the AG base, General Ray Burke ordered the emergency launch of the aircraft carrier Atlahasis. A flock of Nergal approaching the launch orbit of Atlahasis. I don't want to lose my loved one anymore-as soon as I escape from the gravitational sphere, Reika and his friends steer the G's frame and start their first space battle.

Reika and his friends call at the lunar base to repair the Atlas, which has escaped from the damage caused by the implosion by the suppressor, but has suffered a significant decrease in output and malfunction due to the innumerable petrified Nergal. There, Luna goes to the civilian employee graveyard on the moon. Luna tingles in her chest as she heads to the grave marker where her beloved father, who once died in the battle with Nergal, sleeps. On the other hand, in Atlahasis, a Nergal larva that survived without petrification invades the ship and begins to rampage unknowingly.

Atlahasis, whose Divine Grace system has become unusable due to the damage of the White Giant. To restore it, Reika and his friends head to the ruins of Nibiru on Mars. The escort ship Normandy, who was to accompany him from the moonbase to escort Atlahasis. The girl of the AG unit, including Reika and Arhena, is shocked by the idea as a soldier conveyed by the veteran captain Zoe Peterson.

Reika and other AG units arrived in orbit on Mars. An expedition by Reika, Arhena, Air, and Ryo was formed to explore the ancient Nibiru ruins left in the Valles Marineris. There, Reika and his friends are told by Air about the mysteries of ancient ruins left around the globe and the past of Nergal and Nibiru. Arhena listens to the content and remembers a passage from the Gilgamesh epic. A descendant of the Sumerians, she feels a fateful connection with Air.

Atlahasis reaches the Trojan space. Reika was doing extravehicular activities to monitor the route because the radar did not work due to the numerous meteorites. Find a mysterious fluffy floating substance and bring it on board. For some reason, I felt happy when I was staring at it, which gave off a faint phosphorescence, and Reika put it in a bottle and put it on her bedside to sleep. Reika, who began to dream of her sister Rei Ame many times from that day, finally can't wake up from her dream.

Jotis saves Reika, who struggles to fight in outer space for the first time, and falls to the earth with Gandharva. Gandharva burns bright red and sinks to the bottom of the sea in the fire of frictional heat. While the spacesuit is torn and the consciousness is stunned, Jotis remembers the last interaction with Reirain in the Trojan Trojans. -A few months later, the news of "Gandharva discovery" arrived under Iwao and Azef members, and Reika and others on the Atlahasis ship were delighted.

Reika and his friends discover that there is a Nergal colony in the space of Jupiter. The identification signal of Asena was emitted from it. I don't know if my sister, Rei Ame, is alive or dead, but I want to rescue her if there is a possibility, and I definitely don't want to give up. Reika and his friends sortie out of Atlahasis with all their strength. At that time, it catches Asena's communication from the Nergal colony. The appearance of Rei Ame is there-

Titles.eng: Battles in the Mega Red Spotted Area

Summaries.eng: Atlahasis is attacked by a group of Nergal one after another and is in danger of desperation. Luna desperately throws a sword at Reika and others who are cornered, and tries to fight back with Kukulkan. At that time, it was the Divine Grace Energy control unit that Iwao had built into Pororo that saved Reika and his friends who had lost the ability to do it. Immediately after, the attacks of Nergal and others stopped. Reika goes to help her sister, Rei Ame, by herself.

Along with "Ultimate Weapon Elpis", Reika rescues Asena, her long-cherished desire. Immediately after that, however, the Nergal herd disappeared from Jupiter, and communication with the Earth was lost. On the other hand, Rei Ame rescued by Jupiter was like a doll with no intention. She's always wanted to see her favorite sister ... Reika desperately calls out. It was Atlahasis who suddenly changed to the earth with each thought of "Let's go back to the earth".

Reika, Luna, and Arhena, who respond to the ancient robot weapon G's frame and confront Nergal with all their might. Shennon, Kukulkan, Pabilsaĝ ... All aircraft struggle in total war. Seeing that figure, the people left on the earth are also excited. Rei Ame, who regained consciousness, also sortie in Asena with the help of Ryo, and Jotis joins the war with Gandharva from the earth. When the Earth was about to be swallowed by Nergal during the battle of progress and retreat, Nibiru's "final weapon Elpis" was activated by Air and the white giant
